details.description:
Office Hours:
Sunday to Thursday, 08:00 to 15:30 (Local)

For information about:
Consular services to British nationals: consular.DOHAA@fco.gov.uk

If you need to visit the British Embassy for a consular issue, you may need to make an appointment. For all notarial and documentary services an appointment must be made in advance of your visit. Please visit the Notarial and Documentary services section for detailed guidance: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/notarial-and-documentary-services-guide-for-qatar.

UK Trade & Investment enquiries: UKTI.Doha@fco.gov.uk
Visa International Enquiry Service: https://www.gov.uk/contact-ukvi-outside-uk
details.access_and_opening_times:
British Embassy, PO Box 3, Doha. Tel: 00974 44962000 Location: West Bay - Dafna Area, Onaiza Zone 66, Al Shabab Street. Opening hours: Sunday 11:00 - 14:00, Monday to Thursday 08:00 - 10:00

Public holidays

The Embassy will be closed for all business, except emergencies affecting British nationals, on the following days:

Date Holiday
Thursday 1st January New Year’s Day
Thursday 2nd April In Lieu of Good Friday (Friday April 3rd)
Sunday 5th April Easter Sunday
Sunday 3rd May In Lieu of Early May Bank Holiday (Monday May 4th)
Sunday 24th May In Lieu of Late May Bank Holiday (Monday May 25th)
Sunday 19th July In lieu of Provisional date of Eid al Fitr (Saturday July 18th)*
Monday 20th July In lieu of Provisional date of Eid al Fitr (Sunday July 19th)*
Tuesday 21st July In lieu of Provisional date of Eid al Fitr (Monday July 20th)*
Wednesday 23rd September Provisional Date of Eid al Adha*
Thursday 24th September Provisional Date of Eid al Adha*
Sunday 27th September In lieu of Provisional date of Eid al Adha (Friday Sept 25th)*
Thursday 17th December In lieu of Qatar National Day (Friday December 18th)
Thursday 24th December In lieu of Christmas Day (Friday December 25th)
Sunday 27th December In lieu of Boxing Day (Saturday December 26th)

*Expected dates of both holidays, although actual dates may move depending upon sighting of the moon.

Disabled access

Adaptive (Disabled) Parking:

There are reserved parking spaces for disabled visitors in the Embassy’s internal car park. For security purposes visitors wishing to make use of such a space must contact the Embassy at least 24-hours before their visit in order that appropriate security checks can be completed to assist with access to the Embassy.

Adaptive (Disabled) Access:

There is direct access to the Embassy for disabled visitors from the Embassy car park. Visitors with mobility or visual impairments are requested to call the Embassy in advance of their visit in order that we can assist access to the Embassy through our security turnstiles.
